com.tsybulko.dao

Class AbstractCommonDAO<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsybulko.dao.AbstractCommonDAO<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - some entity.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonDAO<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrinkDAOImpl, OrderDAOImpl, UserDAOImpl

    public abstract class AbstractCommonDAO<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommonDAO<T>
    Abstract class dao. Base class for all DAO.
